Articles.Content:
I have no idea what you are talking about, so it can't hurt me. (At least I think that's how it works)

I nuke the next poster from orbit.

Duct Tape + Lead = indestructible and impenetrable radiation shield.

I ride out the blast under my DTL shield while the nuclear conflagration continues onto the next poster

I sit in a refrigerator and ride it out Indiana Jones style.

I crash a moon into the next poster.

Edited March 31, 2014 by Shna_na
Ninja'd
I catch the moon with my giant golf ball net, have a beer, then I target and shoot the next poster with the unobtainium warheads.

I build a massive wall of snow that blocks it!

I throw a duck at the next poster
I catch the duct tape and run away with it. I turn the next poster's car invisable.
I don't have a car. Wait... that's why! I mean... I pat around the garage until I find it and begin to paint it black. Better then not being able to see it, right?

I set up a roadblock outside your house.

I hurl a neutron star at faster than light speeds at the next poster.

I use a Tachyon cannon, whose particles travel back in time and disable you before the neutron cannon fires.

I then roll my old Megatank out of the garage and open fire on the next poster

I set up a roadblock

I then run away from the roadblock, using the next poster as a human shield that is attached to my vehicle.

I teleport to Sentar's moon Skelton.

I throw a truck filled with cabbages at the next poster.

I teleport to Skelton in the North-East of England.

I throw a hot cup of tea at the next user.
I teleport the tea to the center of the sun to cool it down (that is some dang hot tea). The next poster suffers the same fate as the tea.

The absolute fate of the tea is not yet determined. Nothing happens.

I grab the next poster by the face and start shaking them.
I teleport five feet away, out of your reach, and send an army of gatling gun armed goats at the next user.
Unfortunatly, those goats have no idea of how to use gatling gun, so I simply punch your face, in the face.

Assuming that it is I who is punched in the face, in the face, my carbon-plated face-coating prevents any damage or pain.

I teleport the next user to Gallifrey as it falls.

I find one if my crashed inter dimensional escape pods at Gallifrey and I repair it and escape in it.

I crash into the next poster.

Fortunately, I am a quantum being, so I tunnel 500m away as you crash.

Unfortunately, I turn into an anvil 50m above the next poster.

I have a shield of pure plasma, which melts the anvil on contact.

I walk, with my shield, into the next poster.

I hit you with a bullet. Coming out of my gun. The knockback sends you 10 feet away, also you lost 5 movement points.

The next user got hit with a bullet, coming out of my gun. More bullets coming soon.
I matrix the bullet and release the black death/bubonic plague on the next poster.

I am immune!

I throw the next poster into a star that will supernova in 1.583692720117947 seconds.
I activate my shield, deflecting the EXTREMELY radioactive supernova particles to the next poster

I used the particles to heat up my Hungry Man TV Dinner.

I chuck the empty plate at the next poster.
